tours.title: Highlight tours
tours.description: When the most beautiful season hits, Eco Venture brings the unique experiential tours up, into places never before known on the world tourism map-places that will leave you impressed with the beauty of nature and culture.

list.title: TOUR 1-Cultural Package
list.description: 'Foodstep Of The Co Tu' is an immersive cultural tour that takes you deep into the heart of Tây Giang, where the ancient tradition of Co Tu people come to life. Each day of the journey reflects a different aspect of their rich heritage, from the sacred forests and survival wisdom of their ancestors to their vibrant craftsmanship and communal spirit. The experience begins with a trek through the majesty Pomu forest, home to centuries-old trees and hidden medicinal plants, guided by local experts who share the deep-rooted connection between the Cơ Tu and nature. The journey continues with interactive workshops, where you’ll learn traditional weaving, bamboo musical instrument making, and the art of cooking authentic Co Tu cuisine. Beyond exploring the culture, this tour provides a rare opportunity to live as the Cơ Tu do—staying in traditional homestays, participating in farming activities, and joining nightly gatherings filled with folk dances, storytelling, and music. This hands-on experience not only supports local livelihoods but also preserves a way of life that has been passed down through generations.

list.title: TOUR 2-Survival Package
list.description: The 'Echoes of the Jungle: Tay Giang Survival' tour is a thrilling and immersive adventure that blends survival skills, cultural exploration, and nature discovery. Over two days and one night, travelers will embark on a journey into the pristine forests of Tay Giang, where they will learn essential survival techniques, such as filtering water, setting up shelters, and navigating with compasses and maps. The experience is enriched by cultural interactions with the Co Tu people, including visiting the Guol house, witnessing the vibrant Tung Tung Za Za dance, and enjoying traditional cuisine like bamboo-tube rice, grilled chicken, and herbal-infused dishes. Guests will also partake in team-building activities, such as a 'Treasure Hunt' challenge and a nature photography contest, adding an element of excitement to the adventure. With breathtaking treks through ancient forests, refreshing dips in rocky streams, and evenings spent around a lively campfire, this tour offers an unparalleled opportunity to reconnect with nature, embrace local traditions, and create unforgettable memories in the heart of Tay Giang

list.title: TOUR 3-Combine Cultural and Survival Package
list.description: The 'Pomu Challenge – Calling the Soul of Tay Giang' tour is a thrilling 3-day, 2-night adventure that seamlessly blends survival skills and cultural immersion in the breathtaking highlands of Tay Giang. Travelers will trek through the ancient Pơmu forest, learn to build shelters, filter water, and start fires, while also experiencing the rich traditions of the Cơ Tu people. Highlights include hands-on weaving, bamboo music workshops, and traditional baking, as well as evenings spent enjoying folk dances, storytelling, and BBQ feasts around a campfire. With opportunities to explore pristine waterfalls, sip herbal forest tea at sunrise, and stay in a traditional Guol house, this journey offers the perfect mix of nature, adventure, and culture, leaving travelers with unforgettable memories of Tay Giang

list.title: TOUR 4-Combine Culture and Volunteer Package
list.description: The 'Pomu Challenge – Calling the Soul of Tay Giang' tour is a thrilling 3-day, 2-night adventure that seamlessly blends survival skills and cultural immersion in the breathtaking highlands of Tay Giang. Travelers will trek through the ancient Pơmu forest, learn to build shelters, filter water, and start fires, while also experiencing the rich traditions of the Cơ Tu people. Highlights include hands-on weaving, bamboo music workshops, and traditional baking, as well as evenings spent enjoying folk dances, storytelling, and BBQ feasts around a campfire. With opportunities to explore pristine waterfalls, sip herbal forest tea at sunrise, and stay in a traditional Guol house, this journey offers the perfect mix of nature, adventure, and culture, leaving travelers with unforgettable memories of Tay Giang

info.title: Interview Cotu culture
info.description: Người Cơ Tu (còn gọi là người Ka Tu, Gao, Hạ, Phương, Ca-tang) là một dân tộc sống ở Miền Trung (Việt Nam) và Hạ Lào. Dân số người Cơ Tu có khoảng trên 103 nghìn người. Tại Việt Nam người Cơ Tu là một trong số 54 dân tộc tại Việt Nam.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.description: “Completely-disconnect” from the outside world, immerse yourself in nature through trekking and camping activities in primeval forest. Breathing the cool air,, imbued with the sophistication of the long-standing culture of the Cotu people with the beauty of cuisine, arts and crafts, music and life.

list.title: Stories after each trip
list.comment: Dubbed 'miniature Sapa' or 'Da Lat of the Central region', Tay Giang has been a very hot name on the travel map of backpackers. Coming here, you will not only be immersed in the vast and poetic natural scenery; Enjoy the cool feeling between the mountains and forests or watch the beautiful terraced fields but also admire the floating white clouds with your own eyes.

list.title: Beautifuly
list.comment: Dubbed 'miniature Sapa' or 'Da Lat of the Central region', Tay Giang has been a very hot name on the travel map of backpackers. Coming here, you will not only be immersed in the vast and poetic natural scenery; Enjoy the cool feeling between the mountains and forests or watch the beautiful terraced fields but also admire the floating white clouds with your own eyes.

ads.title: Ưu đãi đặc biệt
ads.content: Đăng ký tour vào tháng 9 tới tháng 12 để đón nhận những ưu đãi đặc biệt từ K'Lang Adventure. K'Lang Adventure-Hành trình khám phá sự bí ẩn

list.title: Chương trình Giá-Siêu Hot-Chào mùa leo núi 2023
content: Mùa leo núi sắp điểm, mùa của những thử thách chạm đỉnh, “săn mây” quên lối về; ngắm view mà ở dưới xuôi người ta gọi là triệu đô; trải nghiệm sự kết hợp hoàn hảo giữa Trekking và Săn mây.

list.title: Chính sách giảm giá chung cho tour ghép
content: Mua tour cho 05 người đi cùng một tour vào một ngày khởi hành: giảm 5%
Mua 02 tour cùng một lúc: giảm 5%

development.title: Our Commitment to Sustainability
development.content: This season – as the first blossoms of spring spark feelings of joy and renewal-we celebrate the exceptional natural environments across the globe that K’Lang Adventure calls home.

about.title: The Story About Eco Venture
about.description: Eco Venture, founded in 2025, is a subsidiary of Eco Venture Team. We aim to become a leading travel and tourism enterprise in Southeast Asia, developing sustainable and experiential tourism.

list.title: About Eco Venture Team
list.description: Founded by a passionate group of university students as part of their graduation thesis, Eco Venture Team is more than just a travel initiative—it is a journey of discovery, learning, and cultural preservation. With hands-on experience in Tay Giang, our team has successfully designed and led four immersive tours for over 20 travelers, blending adventure, sustainability, and authentic local interactions. Through trekking in ancient forests, participating in community projects, and engaging with the Cotu people's rich heritage, we aim to redefine experiential travel. Our mission is to promote sustainable tourism while preserving the cultural and natural beauty of Tay Giang. We believe in responsible exploration that not only enriches travelers but also benefits local communities. With a deep commitment to eco-tourism, Eco Venture Team strives to create unforgettable experiences that inspire, educate, and make a lasting impact.

list.title: Eco Venture
list.description: Selecting Tay Giang, Quang Nam – a land of pristine beauty – for sustainable tourism development and cultural preservation of the Cotu people, TAAD Group established Eco Venture Tourism Development and Trade Joint Stock Company.

list.title: VISION & MISSION
list.description: Eco Venture aims to become a leader in Sustainable and Experiential Tourism in the Southeast Asian region. We are committed to transforming Tay Giang into a premier destination for both domestic and international tourists, offering eco-friendly travel experiences deeply rooted in local cultural heritage.

list.tourDes: 'Foodstep Of The Co Tu' is an immersive cultural tour that takes you deep into the heart of Tây Giang, where the ancient tradition of Co Tu people comes to life. Each day of the journey reflects a different aspect of their rich heritage, from the sacred forests and survival wisdom of their ancestors to their vibrant craftsmanship and communal spirit. The experience begins with a trek through the majestic Pomu forest, home to centuries-old trees and hidden medicinal plants, guided by local experts who share the deep-rooted connection between the Cơ Tu and nature. The journey continues with interactive workshops, where you’ll learn traditional weaving, bamboo musical instrument making, and the art of cooking authentic Co Tu cuisine. Beyond exploring the culture, this tour provides a rare opportunity to live as the Cơ Tu do—staying in traditional homestays, participating in farming activities, and joining nightly gatherings filled with folk dances, storytelling, and music. This hands-on experience not only supports local livelihoods but also preserves a way of life that has been passed down through generations.

details.tourDes: 'Foodstep Of The Co Tu' is an immersive cultural tour that takes you deep into the heart of Tây Giang, where the ancient tradition of Co Tu people comes to life. Each day of the journey reflects a different aspect of their rich heritage, from the sacred forests and survival wisdom of their ancestors to their vibrant craftsmanship and communal spirit. The experience begins with a trek through the majestic Pomu forest, home to centuries-old trees and hidden medicinal plants, guided by local experts who share the deep-rooted connection between the Cơ Tu and nature. The journey continues with interactive workshops, where you’ll learn traditional weaving, bamboo musical instrument making, and the art of cooking authentic Co Tu cuisine. Beyond exploring the culture, this tour provides a rare opportunity to live as the Cơ Tu do—staying in traditional homestays, participating in farming activities, and joining nightly gatherings filled with folk dances, storytelling, and music. This hands-on experience not only supports local livelihoods but also preserves a way of life that has been passed down through generations.

journey.day: Day 1: DA NANG – TAY GIANG – CULTURAL AND MEDICINAL PLANT DISCOVERY

details.title: The vehicle and tour guide will pick up guests at 452 Le Van Hien (EcoVenture headquarters). Depart for Tay Giang via the majestic Ho Chi Minh route. Guests will enjoy complimentary croissants and admire the mountain scenery along the way.
Arrive in Tay Giang and enjoy a lunch of local specialties, including bamboo-grilled chicken, sticky rice, and stir-fried wild vegetables at the homestay. Then, check-in and rest.
Head to the medicinal herb area for an exploration
details: Discover various medicinal plants and rare herbs, such as Dang Sam and Ba Kich.
Guides will explain the benefits and traditional medicinal uses of each plant.
Take photos and learn about the process of growing and harvesting medicinal herbs.
Try herbal products like herbal tea and essential oils.

details.title: Experience paddleboarding (SUP) on the fresh river, enjoying nature and relaxing on the water.
Return to the homestay.
Free time to relax.
Enjoy dinner featuring forest chicken hotpot with medicinal herbs and traditional rice wine.
Watch the traditional Cơ Tu dance 'Tung Tung Zá Zá,' then join in cultural exchanges, learning the significance of each movement and melody by the warm campfire.
Herbal foot soak—a traditional Cơ Tu therapy to help restore energy after a long day.
Overnight stay.

journey.day: Day 2: CULTURAL HANDICRAFT EXPERIENCE – RETURN TO DA NANG

details.title: Wake up early to enjoy the sunrise over the mountains (cloud-hunting at the homestay), followed by breakfast featuring ginseng porridge and steamed wild vegetable rolls.
Transfer to Voòng village.

Participate in the village welcoming ceremony, experience brocade weaving, wood carving, and bamboo weaving with local artisans. Learn about cultural significance, traditions, and stories at the Gươl house with the village chief.
Check out of the homestay.
Enjoy lunch at the homestay with local specialties such as grilled meat wrapped in dong leaves and steamed forest vegetables.
Depart for Da Nang, stopping for rest and shopping for local specialties if desired. The journey ends in Da Nang, saying farewell to the group.

list.question: What is the minimum age for children to join this tour?
list.answer: This tour is suitable for children aged 12 or above and accompanied by parents or adults.

list.question: I don't have trekking experience. Can I join this program?
list.answer: The trek has a steep gradient, especially the nearly 1km incline at the foot of the mountain, so it can be quite challenging for those who are not physically active.

Over two days and one night, travelers will embark on a journey into the pristine forests of Tay Giang, where they will learn essential survival techniques, such as filtering water, setting up shelters, and navigating with compasses and maps. The experience is enriched by cultural interactions with the Co Tu people, including visiting the Guol house, witnessing the vibrant Tung Tung Za Za dance, and enjoying traditional cuisine like bamboo-tube rice, grilled chicken, and herbal-infused dishes. Guests will also partake in team-building activities, such as a 'Treasure Hunt' challenge and a nature photography contest, adding an element of excitement to the adventure. With breathtaking treks through ancient forests, refreshing dips in rocky streams, and evenings spent around a lively campfire, this tour offers an unparalleled opportunity to reconnect with nature, embrace local traditions, and create unforgettable memories in the heart of Tay Giang.

journey.day: Day 1: STARTING THE ADVENTURE AND FIRST CHALLENGES

details.title: Gather at 452 Le Van Hien, Khue My, Ngu Hanh Son, Da Nang. Check luggage, receive an overview of the itinerary, and depart for Tay Giang by tourist bus.
Arrive in Tay Giang and enjoy a lunch of grilled bamboo chicken, sticky rice, and stir-fried wild vegetables at the homestay. Then, rest.
Transfer to the survival activity and camping site.
Receive survival equipment (knives, ropes, compasses, maps, etc.), then complete the first survival tasks:
details: Fetching water from the stream: Use provided tools to find and filter clean water.
Setting up tents: Each team must build a tent large enough to accommodate its members.

details.title: Explore the ancient forest:
details: Discover hidden corners of the jungle with a guide.
Learn about endemic flora and fauna, including ancient trees and medicinal herbs.
Trek through paths leading to waterfalls and natural streams.
Nature photography challenge: Teams compete to capture the best landscape photos and share their stories about the forest.

details.title: Enjoy a BBQ dinner in the forest (prepared by organizers) and join the campfire night:
details: Share stories about nature and survival experiences.
Herbal foot soak for relaxation.
Mini awards for the best nature photography team.

details.title: Overnight in tents, experiencing the serene mountain atmosphere.
Wake up, enjoy the fresh air, and have a light breakfast.
Learn how to build temporary shelters using natural materials.
'Treasure Hunt' Challenge:
details: Teams use maps and clues collected from the previous day to search for hidden treasure in the jungle (prizes include local gifts and vouchers).

details.title: Award ceremony:
details: First Prize: Special gift basket with herbal products and essential oils.
Second & Third Prizes: Handmade souvenirs from local artisans.

details.title: Pack up and prepare to leave the homestay.
Depart for Da Nang, with a dinner stop along the way.
Arrive in Da Nang and conclude the journey.

list.question: What is the minimum age for children to join this tour?
list.answer: This tour is suitable for children aged 12 or above and accompanied by parents or adults.

list.question: I don't have trekking experience. Can I join this program?
list.answer: The trek has a steep gradient, especially the nearly 1km incline at the foot of the mountain, so it can be quite challenging for those who are not physically active. You should review the tips and guidelines for preparing for a trip with a difficulty level of 6/10 here.

With opportunities to explore pristine waterfalls, sip herbal forest tea at sunrise, and stay in a traditional Guol house, this journey offers the perfect mix of nature, adventure, and culture, leaving travelers with unforgettable memories of Tay Giang.

journey.day: Day 1: Da Nang - Tay Giang Town - A Banh Village - Camping Site

details.title: Departure from 452 Le Van Hien, Khue My, Ngu Hanh Son, Da Nang
details: Traveling by car through picturesque mountain passes, admiring the majestic natural scenery.

details.title: Arrive at Tay Giang and enjoy a rustic lunch with bamboo-cooked rice, grilled meat, and forest vegetables at a homestay. Free time for rest.
Move to the survival activity location.
'Survival Challenge' Program.
details: Participate in hands-on survival activities:
Stream bathing, fish catching, and collecting drinking water from bamboo tubes with porter guidance.
Learn from local guides about different medicinal plants and leaves that can be used in case of getting lost.

details.title: Set up tents and cook dinner with the guide and porter.
Dinner experience:
details: Enjoy local specialties such as grilled stream fish, grilled pork wrapped in dong leaves, and bamboo-cooked rice by the fire.
Cultural exchange and free activities.

details.title: Overnight in prepared tents.

journey.day: Day 2: CONQUERING THE PRISTINE AND MAGNIFICENT POMU FOREST

details.title: Sunrise in the Forest
details: Enjoy forest leaf tea and buffalo horn-shaped pastries – a unique traditional delicacy.
15-minute meditation by the stream.

details.title: Exploring Po Mu Forest
details: A 2km trek over 2.5 hours.
Discover the ancient Po Mu forest, a natural heritage of Tay Giang.
Local guides (Cơ Tu people) will introduce rare medicinal plants, identification techniques, and uses.
Learn about valuable timber trees, take photos with giant trees, and hear about the cultural significance of Po Mu forest to the Cơ Tu people.

details.title: Rest at the riverside campsite.
Lunch in the Forest
details: Enjoy a light meal prepared from natural ingredients.
After lunch, pack up and return to the homestay to check in and rest.

details.title: Herbal Foot Soak
details: Relax and rejuvenate with a warm herbal foot soak.

details.title: Sunset viewing and free activities at the homestay.
Outdoor BBQ Party.
details: Enjoy a delicious BBQ with local grilled specialties.

details.title: Experience the unique Tung Tung Zá Zá dance of the Cơ Tu people.
Overnight at the homestay.

list.question: What is the minimum age for children to join this tour?
list.answer: This tour is suitable for children aged 12 or above and accompanied by parents or adults.

journey.day: Day 1: DEPARTURE - CƠ TU CULTURE EXPLORATION

details.title: Pick-up at 452 Le Van Hien, Khue My, Ngu Hanh Son
Arrive in Tay Giang, visit the Cơ Tu Cultural Village in A Tieng Commune, Tay Giang
details: Learn about Guol house architecture – the traditional house of the Cơ Tu people, featuring unique thatched roofs and wooden pillars.

details.title: Arrive at homestay, have lunch at Loc Troi Homestay
details: Enjoy specialties like bamboo rice, grilled chicken, and forest vegetables.
Check into rooms and rest (The distance from the Cơ Tu village to Loc Troi Homestay is 18km, approximately 1.5-hour drive).

details.title: Visit Dinh Que Summit
details: One of the highest peaks in Tay Giang.
Enjoy panoramic views of the majestic mountains and lush green valleys.
(Distance: 3km, travel time: 15 minutes).

details.title: Visit the local school in Voong Village
details: Prepare for the next day's volunteer activities.
Meet teachers and students to understand their support needs.
(Distance: 5km, travel time: 25 minutes).

details.title: Return to homestay
Dinner with local specialties
details: Grilled mountain pork, fried stream fish, grilled chicken with bamboo rice.

list.question: What is the minimum age for children to join this tour?
list.answer: This tour is suitable for children aged 12 or above and accompanied by parents or adults.

press.title: Ứng dụng công nghệ VR/AR vào tour du lịch Tây Giang

list.title: Trải nghiệm thực tế ảo (VR) khám phá rừng Pơ Mu và văn hóa Cơ Tu

description.text: Sử dụng VR để tạo ra các chuyến du lịch ảo đưa khách tham quan Quần thể rừng Pơ Mu trên núi Zi'link (Tây Giang), nơi có 1.396 cây và 725 cây đạt chuẩn Cây Di sản Việt Nam. Du khách có thể 'đi bộ' qua rừng nguyên sinh, nghe âm thanh tự nhiên và tìm hiểu về hệ sinh thái đa dạng ngay từ nhà.

application.text: Tái hiện không gian làng Cơ Tu với nhà Gươl, lễ hội truyền thống và các điệu múa múa qua mô hình 3D động động. Du khách đeo kính VR có thể 'tham gia' các nghi lễ hoặc xem nghệ thuật Cơ Tu làm nghề thủ công.

benefits.text: Thu hút du khách quốc tế, đặc biệt những người không thể đến trực tiếp, đồng thời quảng bá vẻ đẹp thiên nhiên và văn hóa Tây Giang.

list.title: Hướng dẫn AR ảo tại điểm đến thực tế

description.text: Phát triển ứng dụng AR trên điện thoại thông minh để du khách quét các địa điểm tại Tây Giang (như rừng Pơ Mu, làng Cơ Tu). Khi quét, thông tin về lịch sử, ý nghĩa văn hóa, hoặc hướng dẫn đường đi sẽ hiện lên dưới dạng hình ảnh, video hoặc văn bản chồng lên khung cảnh thực tế.

application.text: Tại rừng Pơ Mu, AR có thể hiển thị thông tin về từng cây cổ thụ, tuổi đời, hoặc người Cơ Tu bảo vệ rừng. Tại làng, AR tái hiện hình ảnh quá khứ của ngôi làng qua các lớp chồng thời gian.

benefits.text: Tăng tính tương tác, giúp du khách hiểu sâu hơn về điểm đến mà không cần hướng dẫn người thực tế mọi lúc.

list.title: Thử trước khi cài đặt chuyến tham quan bằng VR

description.text: Trước khi đặt tour, du khách có thể trải nghiệm phiên bản VR của hành trình du lịch Tây Giang: từ cảnh quan núi rừng, các hoạt động mạo hiểm hiểm (leo núi, trekking), đến nghỉ nghỉ tại homestay Cơ Tu. VR cho phép xem trước các góc quay 360 độ và cảm nhận không thực tế.

benefits.text: Tăng cường sự tự tin khi đặt tour, đặc biệt với du khách quốc tế hoặc những người lần đầu đến Tây Giang, đồng thời giảm nguy cơ hủy chuyến tham quan bất kỳ kỳ vọng nào không phù hợp.

list.title: Du lịch mạo hiểm toàn với AR

description.text: Ứng dụng AR hỗ trợ các tour du lịch mạo hiểm như leo núi hoặc khám phá rừng sâu tại Tây Giang. Khi khách hàng sử dụng kính AR hoặc điện thoại, ứng dụng sẽ hiển thị đường đi an toàn, cảnh báo khu vực nguy hiểm (rào chắn) và cung cấp thông tin tiết kiệm thực tế.

application.text: Trong chuyến đi trekking, AR có thể đánh dấu các điểm nghỉ chân, chỉ dẫn vị trí uống nước hoặc hiển thị thông tin về động thực vật tìm kiếm trên đường.

benefits.text: Đảm bảo an toàn theo tiêu chuẩn ISO 12592:2018, đồng thời nâng cao trải nghiệm khám phá.

list.title: Bảo tồn và giáo dục qua VR/AR

description.text: Tạo các chương trình VR/AR giáo dục về nỗ lực bảo vệ rừng và văn hóa tại Tây Giang, như dự án “Trồng 1 tỷ cây xanh” của phủ Chính. VR có thể mô phỏng quá trình trồng rừng, trong khi AR cho phép du khách tại phòng xem thông tin về các cây đã trồng (loài, năm trồng, ý nghĩa).

benefits.text: Góp phần nâng cao nhận thức về du lịch bền vững, khuyến du khách tham gia bảo tồn, và lan tỏa thông điệp 'rừng còn Tây Giang phát triển'.

list.title: Gamification qua AR để tăng tương tác

description.text: Tích hợp trò chơi AR vào tour du lịch, ví dụ: du khách tìm 'kho báu văn hóa Cơ Tu' bằng cách quét các địa điểm để nhận mối mối hoặc giải tranh về thiên nhiên Tây Giang.

application.text: Một trò chơi AR yêu cầu khách hàng tìm hiểu về cây Pơ Mu hoặc tái hiện điệu múa Cơ Tu để nhận phần thưởng ảo (huy hiệu, tích tích lũy).

benefits.text: Tăng sự thú vị, đặc biệt với Gen Z và Millennials, đồng thời quảng bá điểm đến qua mạng xã hội khi du khách chia sẻ trải nghiệm.
